item.title: Trump Stops Tax Dollars From Funding Transgender Ideology In Other Countries
item.description: The State Department is ensuring that taxpayer dollars don’t fund trans ideology thinly disguised as 'global humanitarian assistance.'

item.title: Starmer’s Pathetic China Debut Is A Lesson For All Western Leaders
item.description: Europe must learn that Xi Jinping only plays nice when faced with resolute strength, not bowing and scraping.

item.title: Purdue Hiring 1,000 Foreigners In 5 Years Illustrates Higher Ed’s H-1B Problem
item.description: The H-1B program has turned into a privileged hiring initiative for universities, with 16,000 such visas issued for the last two semesters.

item.title: SCOTUS Rejects Bid To Block California’s ‘Racially Gerrymandered’ Congressional Map
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court rejected a Republican-led effort to block California Democrats’ “racially gerrymandered” congressional map on Wednesday. In an ...

item.title: Europeans Testify On How Europe Is Banning Americans From Saying What They Believe
item.description: 'European laws [are] now being exported by the European Union. ... American speech is already being affected.'
